mapper.select: select myblog_article_id, myblog_article_title, myblog_article_contents, myblog_article_creationtime, myblog_user_name, myblog_user_headportrait, myblog_label_name from myblog_article_html as articlehtml, myblog_user as user, myblog_label as label where DEL_FLAG=0 and myblog_article_id=#{myblogArticleId} and user.myblog_user_id=articlehtml.myblog_user_id and label.myblog_label_id=articlehtml.myblog_label_id
